descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Model ship lovers rejoice! This is a collection of six finely-detailed vessels for viewing at both model- and actual-scale. Relax and enjoy the Zen-like calm that piloting small boats on water instills. Pick them up for a closer look. Compete against "ghost-ships" to capture buoys. Sail them inside your own living-room via mixed-reality.  Leisurely stroll their full-scale decks while at sea, where each ship includes an "action" event, whereby mighty cannons fire, ship horns bellow, or the submarine dives.

Included Ships:
- Ocean liner: RMS Queen Mary
- English "race built" galleon: The Mermaid (fictional)
- Zumwalt class destroyer: USS Zumwalt (DDG-1000)
- Iowa class battleship: USS Iowa (BB-61)
- Research vessel: RV Calypso
- German submarine: U-boat Type VII-C/41 (U-659)

Designed for use with a single controller:
- Button A/X: change to next ship (long-press for previous)
- Button B/Y: change to next environment (long-press for previous)
- Trigger: move in direction controller is pointing.
- Grip: (model-scale) grab ship , (full-scale) activate action.
- Thumbstick: (model-scale) control ship, (full-scale) change-time & snap-turn
- Thumb button: (ship model) double speed, (submarine model) hold to dive, tap to surface
